summary: A collection of unit tests that verify the correct parsing and generation of SDP data within the WebRTC library, including H264 codec profile handling, session description construction, and negotiation of audio, video, and data channels across different browser configurations.
business_intent: To guarantee robust and standardsâ€‘compliant SDP processing, preventing errors in codec negotiation, DTLS/ICE setup, and RTCP feedback handling, thereby ensuring reliable WebRTC communication across platforms.
